H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H1486.def: = specially marked object, such as a pebble or piece of pottery, ► used in order to decide questions

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H8672.def: = state in which a countable entity is nine in number

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H5068.def: = causative action by which humans are made willing by their inner person to perform a certain task

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H4082.def: = an adminstrative division of a country or a city

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H272.def: = state of ownership of land, including any buildings and population centers located on it, or slaves

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H5411.def: literally, "the ones given" or "the dedicated ones"; hence = persons who were responsbile for doing regular tasks in the Temple and for serving the priests

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H5159.def: = process by which possessions are transferred from one generation to the next

71.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H5411.def: literally, "the ones given" or "the dedicated ones"; hence = persons who were responsbile for doing regular tasks in the Temple and for serving the priests

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H6077.def: always as K of {L:טְחֹרִים<SDBH:טְחֹרִים>}; exact meaning uncertain: = swelling of internal parts of the body or sores; ◄ probably due to an infectious disease such as dysentery or bubonic plague; ≈ regarded as painful, enfeebling and threatening to a community

H6727.def: = man; ► head of a line of {L:temple servants<SDBH:נָתִין>}; overseer of their work in the temple; after exile

H1658.def: = man; ► head of a line of {L:temple servants<SDBH:נָתִין>}; overseer of their work in the temple; after exile

H6496.def: = a person assigned to be in charge of a particular group, or to have certain responsibilities as a ruler

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H5813.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Bukki<SDBH:בֻּקִּי>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H4316.def: = man; ◄ descendant of king {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}

H623.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Berechiah<SDBH:בֶּרֶכְיָהוּ>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► temple singer; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H4399.def: = an activity involving a physical effort and usually requiring a certain amount of training or skill

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H4687.def: = causative action by which humans or deities prescribe or instruct (other) humans or themselves how to behave or respond to a situation

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6611.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H2226.def: = process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well-being

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

71.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H2691.def: = collection of dwellings, not surrounded by a wall

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H7153.def: = town, later known as {L:Hebron<SDBH:חֶבְרֹון>}; ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; named after one of the {L:Anakites<SDBH:עֲנָק>}

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H1769.def: = a town ◄ in {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}; said to be built by the tribe of {L:Gad<SDBH:גָּד>}, ► but also attributed to the tribe of {L:Reuben<SDBH:רְאוּבֵן>}

H3343.def: = town, also known as {L:Kabzeel<SDBH:קַבְצְאֵל>}; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

51.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H3442.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H884.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:Negeb<SDBH:נֶגֶב>}, at the southern border of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► used esp. in combination with {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>} at the northern border of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} to refer to all Israel

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H6860.def: = town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of {L:Simeon<SDBH:שִׁמְעֹון>}; ► belonged to {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>} and given to {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} before he moved to {L:Hebron<SDBH:חֶבְרֹון>} where he was made king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H6881.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>}

H3412.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H2182.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H5725.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} and his men used to hide in a nearby cave

H2691.def: = collection of dwellings, not surrounded by a wall

H3923.def: = fortified town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H5825.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H2583.def: = state in which an individual or group of people dwells at a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose

H884.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:Negeb<SDBH:נֶגֶב>}, at the southern border of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► used esp. in combination with {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>} at the northern border of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} to refer to all Israel

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H1516.def: = a land depression sided or encircled by mountains or elevations

H2011.def: literally: {L:valley of (the son(s) of) Hinnom<SDBH:גֵּי בְנֵי־הִנֹּם>}; = valley, ◄ located west and south of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>}; ► infamous for the idol worship that took place there

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1387.def: = town, possibly to be identified with {L:Gibeah<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}; ◄ territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► given to Levites; hometown of King {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>}

H1008.def: = town and cult centre, also referred to as {L:Beth-Aven<SDBH:בֵּית אָוֶן>} or simply {L:Aven<SDBH:אָוֶן>}; ◄ territory of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}, near the border of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H7414.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H1664.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► location where the  {L:Beerothites<SDBH:בְּאֵרֹות>} found refuge

H5041.def: = town or village; ◄ territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; after exile

H1516.def: = a land depression sided or encircled by mountains or elevations

H2798.def: = person with the skill to produce an artifact out of rough materials, such as stone, wood, metal

H4256.def: = a group of people within a larger group, placed together for a particular task or duty

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties
